name: sample
description:
The sample command extracts a random sample of features from OSM data. Supports:

- Fixed count or percentage-based sampling
- Reproducible results with seed
- Type and tag filtering
- Multiple output formats including OSM XML

Useful for testing, data exploration, and creating representative subsets.

options.--type: Element type: nodes, ways, all (default: all)
options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv, osm (default: geojson)

output: Randomly sampled features with full geometry and tags in the specified format.
